text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The day of the tryouts has arrived.<n>Excitement fills the
stadium as<n>gaggles of trainers swarm in to get a<n>glimpse
of the students.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Ohohoho! Everyone, bear witness to<n>how a first-rate racer
runs!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: It looks like you're in a good mood<n>today, King!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Indeeeed I am! I'm feeling fully<n>recharged and confident in
my<n>preparations!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
By the end of today, every trainer will<n>be fighting over me,
for I plan to make<n>a bold statement in all 12 races!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Whaaat? You're going to run in all 12<n>races?!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Why, of course. The more races I<n>participate in, the higher
my chances<n>of getting scouted become!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Hmm, wait a second... I thought you<n>get disqualified if you
sign up for more<n>than one race.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ...What?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: N-no one told me that!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Well, she certainly has made an<n>impression already.

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Given her mother's background as a<n>legendary first-rate
racer, she certainly<n>has a lot to live up to. Let's see if she<n>
inherited those skills!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And so, the tryouts begin.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Bang!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The 1600-meter turf race has officially<n>kicked off! What kind
of performance<n>will we see today from our<n>contestants?

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The race is off to a bit of a slower<n>start. The front is starting
to bunch up!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
King Halo has made her way to the<n>middle of the pack! But
she's in a<n>tough spot—the path forward is<n>blocked!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Tch... You all have some real guts<n>getting in my way!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Hmm. Looks like King Halo keeps<n>trying to advance, but she
can't find a<n>good position.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
She's always going on about<n>first-rate this, first-rate that,
but it<n>doesn't look like she has the<n>substance to back up
her words.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
If anything, it seems like her pride and<n>desperation are
bringing her down.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Is there something wrong with King<n>Halo? She still hasn't
made her move<n>yet! The leaders have already broken<n>off
into a sprint!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Wait, what?! They're going already?!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Aghhh! What a waste of time going at<n>this pace!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
King Halo has finally kicked into high<n>gear! What a
spectacular display of<n>power! The gap is rapidly closing!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Of course... It's because I'm the<n>kiiing!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer B
text_block_list.text:
Dang, she's so fast! She caught up<n>to the front in no time!
Maybe she<n>really does have the skills!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The last spurt of the race is a<n>demonstration of true power.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Despite the leading runner being a<n>whole furlong ahead,
King Halo's<n>intimidating determination sends a<n>strong
message across the track.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her technique, albeit a bit rough<n>around the edges, shows
the potential<n>to stand face-to-face with top-notch<n>racers.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
But it's too little, too late! The leading<n>runner is across the
line! King Halo<n>finishes in second place!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... Ugh.
choice_data_list: That was an amazing last spurt!
That was an amazing last spurt!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Of course. Who do you think I am?<n>But such results aren't
befitting of me.<n>How could I possibly finish second...

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Hang on. You're the trainer from<n>earlier, aren't you? Did
you come to<n>scout me?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, it looks like the first wave of<n>recruiters has already
arrived! Very<n>well, I'll give you the honor of<n>marketing
yourself to me!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
I'm all ears—tell me about yourself.<n>What kind of trainer are
you?
choice_data_list: I want to help you win the big races!
I want to help you win the big races!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: I don't care to know what you'd dofor me, I want to know who youare as a person.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
But given how little substance your<n>answer contains, I'm
going to have to<n>pass.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
I'm only looking for first-rate trainers.<n>I won't settle for
anyone less. Right<n>now, you just don't have the<n>qualities
I require.
choice_data_list:
I might be a new trainer now, but I'm going to
become first-rate one day!

I might be a new trainer now, but I'm going to
become first-rate one day!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: One day? And when is that exactly?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
For you trainers, you can keep cycling<n>through different
racers until one of<n>them gives you the results to call<n>
yourself "first-rate".

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
But it's different for us. The actual<n>racers. We only have
one chance to<n>prove ourselves on the track.

text_block_list.name: Cat-eyed Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Hey, King! Sorry to interrupt, but your<n>phone is ringing...

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Ah, is that so? Thanks for letting me<n>know. I'll be right
there.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Anyway, I'm going to take my leave<n>now. Goodbye.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Looks like you just got dumped.<n>Don't let it get you down
though! That<n>princess is only going to make it to<n>G3 or G2
races at best.

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer B
text_block_list.text:
Yup, she's just a small fish in the<n>pond who's in for a rude
awakening.<n>The only thing she's got going for her<n>is her
pride. It's better to not waste<n>time on her.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The trainers around me try to cheer<n>me up.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
But I can't get King Halo's words<n>about the qualities of a
first-rate<n>trainer out of my mind.
